The strength of how good you are is not completely reliant on whether your accepted or not[/size][/center] [hr] [center][size=12pt][b]Staff Application[/b][/size][/center] [Code=Staff]Age: Location: Do you have experiences with being a staff member? What would you do in a situation where one person may be lying and one person may not be? Would you say you are good with people? Admin or mod? Would you say you are dedicated? How will you commit to this project?[/code]
[center][size=12pt][b]GFX Designer Application[/b][/size][/center] [Code=GFX]Age: Location: Do you have experiences with modelling and graphics?? Do you have an example of what you have made in the past? If you do please post it here - [Image here] How will you commit to this project?[/code]

Rate yourself on a 1-10 on how good you are (Note* Not picking on how good you are but how commited): Have you posted a tutorial before? If so please link it - How will you commit to this project?[/code] [hr] [hr] [center][IMG]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r749/dillon_munien1/0kQIzui_zps6b412697.png[/img][/center]

item.title: TheTwoWorlds ~Now 718 running custom content~ ~Staff and programmers needed~
item.dc:creator: @Techkid Techkid
item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

Programmer Age: 15
Location: Barrie, Ontario, Canada
Have you programmed before? Yes I have been programming java for 2 years in all environments,
Rate yourself on a 1-10 on how good you are (Note* Not picking on how good you are but how commited): 7
Have you posted a tutorial before? If so please link it -
http://www.youtube.com/user/TechkidfulHD
all videos are on that channel
How will you commit to this project? by programming to the best of my ability! I will not stop even if it takes me all night!

Read full topic

item.title: TheTwoWorlds ~Now 718 running custom content~ ~Staff and programmers needed~
item.dc:creator: @alexjerta alexjerta
item.description:
@alexjerta wrote:

Age: 15
Location: Australia
Do you have experiences with being a staff member?
Yes, I have been Administrator on some popular minecraft servers, I also am a moderator on two Dark RP Garry’s Mod servers.
What would you do in a situation where one person may be lying and one person may not be?
I would write down their point of view of what happened then If people where around I would write down their side of the story, then I would believe the person with the most amount of evidence. If no one was around I would give them both a warning.
Would you say you are good with people?
I’m a friendly guy who loves getting involved with events and helping people out, so yes I would say i’m good with people.
Admin or mod?
I don’t mind, whatever you deem I should get.
Would you say you are dedicated?
Yes, I’m extremely dedicated to being staff.
How will you commit to this project?
I will commit my assistance with the community when the server get’s released.

Please email me at : alexjerta@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: TheTwoWorlds ~Now 718 running custom content~ ~Staff and programmers needed~

item.title: TheTwoWorlds ~Now 718 running custom content~ ~Staff and programmers needed~
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Age: 17 (18 on the 24th :))
Location: The Netherlands
Have you programmed before? I have. I have a few years of experience with RSPS’s and about 3/4 year with 667+
Rate yourself on a 1-10 on how good you are (Note* Not picking on how good you are but how commited): 8/10. I can be online every day, amount of time differs each day since I don’t have a clear schedule all week…
Note: My commitment depends on trust. I can’t work if people don’t trust me.
Have you posted a tutorial before? If so please link it No I haven’t…
How will you commit to this project? I can code. Simple as that. I can’t do everything, because i’m not a 10/10 coder, but I will do all I can to deliver the desired feature or improvement.

if interested, PM me or add me on skype: Dutchphoenix

Read full topic

Age: Location: Do you have experiences with modelling and graphics?? Do you have an example of what you have made in the past? If you do please post it here - [Image here] How will you commit to this project?

Age: Location: What do you believe to be a good economy in a rsps? What do you believe to be a good community? Have you managed a server before? How will you commit to this project?

[center][size=12pt]Programmer[/size][/center]

Age: Location: Have you programmed before? Rate yourself on a 1-10 on how good you are (Note* Not picking on how good you are but how commited): Have you posted a tutorial before? If so please link it - How will you commit to this project?
